meta.name: hazard classification auto suite (modified sampleData)
meta.notes: 30 testcases auto-generated from hazard_cards_v5 sampleData with slight numeric perturbations/missing rows; memory disabled to avoid hints. Score checks whether output JSON hazard_id matches expected_hazard_id.
